subject: Kentucky Oaks Horse Race
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Dreaming of Julia won her last race, the Gulfstream Park Oaks at the end of March, but will not be running in the Kentucky Derby. Instead, she will compete in the $1 million Kentucky Oaks.
snippet: Dreaming of Julia won her last race, the Gulfstream Park Oaks at the end of March, but will not be running in the Kentucky Derby. Instead, she will compete in the $1 million Kentucky Oaks.
